description:
Where durability and comfort meet. Rugged performance for life on the go.
Toughness, durability, and comfort define the legendary Free Ryder Mens Pant. Equipped with our innovative articulated knee design, the Free Ryder created a new standard for those that live life on the move. KÜHLs unique dying process delivers a vintage, “lived-in” appearance as fading occurs. Reinforced pockets and bottom cuffs provide extended life to this classic jean style. Home of the original Stealth Cell Phone Pocket.
name: Kuhl Free Rydr Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens
